question.body: Which of the following represents ventricular depolarization?

multiple_choice.choice: Wave 1, which is the R wave.
Wave 1, which is the P wave.
Wave 2, which is the R wave.
Wave 3, which is the P wave.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Wave 1 is neither the R wave, nor represents ventricular depolarization.
Incorrect. Although wave 1 is the P wave, it does not represent ventricular depolarization.
Correct. The R wave is in the middle of the tracing and represents ventricular depolarization.
Incorrect. Wave 3 is neither the P wave, nor represents ventricular depolarization.
